Updates the user's cookie and tracking consent preferences

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"analytics":{"type":"boolean","description":"Consent for analytics and usage tracking","example":false,"default":false},"social":{"type":"boolean","description":"Consent for social media features and sharing","example":false,"default":false},"advertising":{"type":"boolean","description":"Consent for personalized advertising","example":false,"default":false}},"required":["analytics","social","advertising"],"title":"TrackingConsentDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
